name: Greatest 20-Minute Ramen of Your Life
instructions: In a pan, melt butter, add corn, and salt. Stir until hot and the butter is browned.
In a separate pan or wok, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add ground pork and sear until browned, then mash it up.
Set the pork aside. Add sesame oil to the pan and sauté the shallots, garlic, and ginger for about 2 minutes.
Stir in sugar and spicy chili crisp.
Return the pork to the pan. Add miso paste, chicken stock, and handashi.
Bring to a simmer, then reduce heat.
Boil water in a separate pot. Cook ramen noodles according to package directions, then drain.
Add the cooked ramen noodles to the broth.
Serve with green onions and a soft boiled egg (optional).
